title: Champion Select Error
body: So when I was queuing up for a game, I accepted the game but on my screen only five people including me accepted and it was stuck like that for a while. It stopped after about two minutes and I was at the home page. Then I tried queuing up for another game, but then I received a queue timer. I guess I was in champion selection but on my screen I never was. Did this happen to anyone else and can I get the queue timer removed?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is losing connection during champion select, which is when our servers pick up everyone in the queue and places them together.  For your specific issue, it seems that you're getting left behind.  No worries, we have a [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that can help get this fixed up and back in the game.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards, and I'd be happy to help!
